description: This Java class defines a service layer for managing products in an e-commerce or inventory application. It provides methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete products, utilizing a ProductRepository for persistence. The class is annotated as a Spring Service and manages transactional boundaries.

classes.name: ProductService
classes.description: Service layer component for handling business logic related to Product entities, including create, read, update, and delete operations.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Product, resetting its ID to null before saving.

methods.name: findById
methods.description: Fetches a Product by its ID or throws ProductNotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Product identified by ID with new details.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a Product by its ID if it exists, throws exception if not.
